Table of Contents

Namespace ECCLibrary.Data

Classes

AggressiveToPilotingVehicleData

Contains data pertaining to the AggressiveToPilotingVehicle component, which encourages creatures to target any small vehicle that the player may be piloting (this includes ANY vehicle that inherits from the Vehicle component i.e. the Seamoth or Prawn Suit). Not many creatures use this component, but ones that do will be VERY aggressive (Boneshark levels of aggression!).

AggressiveWhenSeeTargetData

Contains data pertaining to the AggressiveWhenSeeTarget component, which enables the creature to become aggressive towards specific fauna/the player.

AnimateByVelocityData

Contains data pertaining to the AnimateByVelocity component. This component sets animation parameters based on the creature's direction & velocity.

AttackCyclopsData

Contains data pertaining to creating the AttackCyclops CreatureAction.

AttackLastTargetData

Contains data pertaining to creating the AttackLastTarget CreatureAction.

AvoidObstaclesData

Contains data pertaining to creating the AvoidObstacles CreatureAction. This component is used by most creatures (everything besides leviathans) to avoid objects and/or terrain.

AvoidTerrainData

Contains data pertaining to creating the AvoidTerrain CreatureAction. This is a more advanced and expensive collision avoidance system used by leviathans.

CreatureSpawnData

Class containing data related to creature spawning, simplifying usage of the Nautilus.Handlers.LootDistributionHandler.

CreatureTemplate

This class contains all settings related to the registering and automatic prefab initialization of creatures by the library.

CustomGameObjectReference

Alternative to UnityEngine.AddressableAssets.AssetReferenceGameObject that is always marked as valid for custom prefabs.

EdibleData

Contains data pertaining to the Eatable [sic] component.

FleeOnDamageData

Contains data pertaining to creating the FleeOnDamage CreatureAction.

FleeWhenScaredData

Contains data pertaining to creating the FleeWhenScared CreatureAction.

LocomotionData

Contains data pertaining to creating the Locomotion component.

PickupableFishData

Contains data pertaining to picking up and/or holding fish in your hands.

RespawnData

Contains data pertaining to the CreatureDeath component.

ScareableData

Contains data pertaining to the Scareable component. This component is what enables small fish to swim away from the player and potential predators.

StayAtLeashData

Contains data pertaining to creating the StayAtLeashPosition CreatureAction. This component keeps creatures from wandering too far.

SwimBehaviourData

Contains data pertaining to creating the SwimBehaviour component.

SwimInSchoolData

Contains data pertaining to adding the SwimInSchool CreatureAction.

Each schooling creature chooses a single "leader" larger than itself (and of the same TechType) to follow. Therefore, the SizeDistribution property should be defined for this action to function properly.

SwimRandomData

Contains data pertaining to creating the SwimRandom CreatureAction.

VFXFabricatingData

Data that controls the creation of the VFXFabricating component on a prefab, in order to have a model in the Fabricator.

Structs

BehaviourLODData

Contains data pertaining to certain creature functions becoming more optimized (lower quality) at a distance. Default values are (10, 50, 500).

CreatureComponents

Stores references to the basic components of a creature. Each field should not be expected to be assigned.

CreatureTraitsData

Contains basic data pertaining to the CreatureTraits of a creature.

WaterParkCreatureDataStruct

Contains data pertaining to the WaterParkCreatureData ScriptableObject. If assigned, allows a creature to be released in Alien Containment.

Enums

ItemSoundsType

Enum with values that correspond to item pickup sounds.

Made with docfx
